channel.title: [Source] ScarScape Reborn v1.0
channel.description:
[b][u]Preface[/u][/b] This is NOT Sythe's ScarScape. I don't think ScarScape's worth 5 bucks when ARGA is completely free! Plus it takes no effort, so, sorry Sythe, you're gonna have to actually do some work, not slap together 500 lines and charge 100 people 5$ each... Your time is not worth nearly that much, sorry! In conclusion Sythe is all about the money, and I just don't care... By the way, concider anything Sythe says like it is from the mouth of Babe (a child, as in he's naive)... He really has a very minute understanding of what he's doing, just because you're not banned right away has nothing to do with detectability! I can log on a deob for 2 days, does that mean it's undetected or unbannable or whatever he said? HELL NO, Sythe's assumptions are very poor. Circumstance has nothing to do with code, or anyhting like that, they either [i]are[/i] or [i]aren't[/i].
[b][u]Description[/u][/b] This DOES IMPLEMENT more anti-detection than Sythe p2p ScarScape.... There's one main difference currently I'm too lazy to hook the bytecode for 0x whatever that makes the map angled, mind you this is my first BCEL hack in AGES, I use PSBL so excuse my laziness. Deal with the slight rotation, it still stays still like scarscape soooo yeah. I hope everyone understands my reasons for doing this, just look at the hack itself it's no work really at all. and it's a very NASTY hack at that.Took me 13 minutes from start to finish from concieve, to hack, to debug, to test, and add booleans for you guys to play with if you wanna play with the source.... uh I honestly dont see how this can concievably break, it just sits between java.lang.Math and the client, and intercepts... Call it the "Code-Proxy" concept, whatever it is, it works, autoupdates etc...Feel free to change it alter it edit it and re-release it as you please, I don't care, this is as is, just give credit for the basis! <3
[b][u]Download[/u][/b] http://www.revilosoft.com/runescape/scarscape-src.zip
[size=18pt]ENJOI[/size]
EDIT: Btw you might need to change the package referencese to BCEL as I just used the sun copy, lol told yah, lazy. EDIT: I bitched for a sticky :P
moparisthebest edit: Mirror: http://www.moparisthebest.com/downloads/scarscape79145.zip

item.title: [Source] ScarScape Reborn v1.0

item.description:
@Lacky wrote:

[quote=“pplsuqbawlz, post:1, topic:46933”]Preface
This is NOT Sythe’s ScarScape. I don’t think ScarScape’s worth 5 bucks when ARGA is completely free! Plus it takes no effort, so, sorry Sythe, you’re gonna have to actually do some work, not slap together 500 lines and charge 100 people 5$ each… Your time is not worth nearly that much, sorry! In conclusion Sythe is all about the money, and I just don’t care… By the way, concider anything Sythe says like it is from the mouth of Babe (a child, as in he’s naive)… He really has a very minute understanding of what he’s doing, just because you’re not banned right away has nothing to do with detectability! I can log on a deob for 2 days, does that mean it’s undetected or unbannable or whatever he said? HELL NO, Sythe’s assumptions are very poor. Circumstance has nothing to do with code, or anyhting like that, they either are or aren’t.

Description
This DOES IMPLEMENT more anti-detection than Sythe p2p ScarScape… There’s one main difference currently I’m too lazy to hook the bytecode for 0x whatever that makes the map angled, mind you this is my first BCEL hack in AGES, I use PSBL so excuse my laziness. Deal with the slight rotation, it still stays still like scarscape soooo yeah. I hope everyone understands my reasons for doing this, just look at the hack itself it’s no work really at all. and it’s a very NASTY hack at that.Took me 13 minutes from start to finish from concieve, to hack, to debug, to test, and add booleans for you guys to play with if you wanna play with the source… uh I honestly dont see how this can concievably break, it just sits between java.lang.Math and the client, and intercepts… Call it the “Code-Proxy” concept, whatever it is, it works, autoupdates etc…Feel free to change it alter it edit it and re-release it as you please, I don’t care, this is as is, just give credit for the basis! <3

EDIT: Btw you might need to change the package referencese to BCEL as I just used the sun copy, lol told yah, lazy.
